title: Shaman’s Awakening - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Doctors   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Romantic Subplot   Spirit Users
author: XianXia Grandmaster   一代仙侠
description:
Able to communicate with spirits and gods and an expert on medicine.

Since time immemorial, a Shaman does not distinguish between the two.

An accomplished Shaman is questioned neither by the spirits nor the gods.

Even disasters and calamities are kept at arms length.

However, can an accomplished Shaman cure the heart?

Take a look at the awakening of the strongest Shaman~>
